explains: adv. 重要地，重要的是；自命不凡地

sentences.en: More importantly, can he be trusted?
sentences.cn: 更重要的是，他值得信任吗？

sentences.en: I was hungry, and, more importantly, my children were hungry.
sentences.cn: 我饿了，更重要的是，我的孩子们饿了。

sentences.en: More importantly, gays have proved themselves to be style leaders.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是，同性恋们证实了他们是时尚的引导者。
